channel.title: Clipping Attack Player Error
channel.description:
[b]Hello Moparscape[/b] I got this error when i attack a player :
[23-4-13 21:05]: java.lang.NullPointerException [23-4-13 21:05]: at server.world.Region.getClipping(Region.java:330) [23-4-13 21:05]: at server.model.players.PathFinder.findRoute(PathFinder.java:57) [23-4-13 21:05]: at server.model.players.PlayerAssistant.playerWalk(PlayerAssistan t.java:28) [23-4-13 21:05]: at server.model.players.PlayerAssistant.followPlayer(PlayerAssist ant.java:1383) [23-4-13 21:05]: at server.model.players.packets.AttackPlayer.processPacket(Attack Player.java:147) [23-4-13 21:05]: at server.model.players.PacketHandler.processPacket(PacketHandler .java:138) [23-4-13 21:05]: at server.model.players.Client.processQueuedPackets(Client.java:1 187) [23-4-13 21:05]: at server.model.players.PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java: 142) [23-4-13 21:05]: at server.Server.main(Server.java:165) [23-4-13 21:05]: java.lang.NullPointerException [23-4-13 21:05]: at server.world.Region.getClipping(Region.java:330) [23-4-13 21:05]: at server.model.players.PathFinder.findRoute(PathFinder.java:57) [23-4-13 21:05]: at server.model.players.PlayerAssistant.playerWalk(PlayerAssistan t.java:28) [23-4-13 21:05]: at server.model.players.PlayerAssistant.followPlayer(PlayerAssist ant.java:1383) [23-4-13 21:05]: at server.model.players.Client.process(Client.java:603) [23-4-13 21:05]: at server.model.players.PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java: 144) [23-4-13 21:05]: at server.Server.main(Server.java:165)
Can you maby help me to fix this error ? Thanks a lot for time and maby for fix!

item.title: Clipping Attack Player Error
item.dc:creator: @Skaffa Skaffa
item.description:
@Skaffa wrote:

[quote=“Strucker, post:2, topic:517793”][quote author=Skaffa link=topic=636056.msg4288185#msg4288185 date=1366744596]
Hello Moparscape

I got this error when i attack a player :

[quote][23-4-13 21:05]: java.lang.NullPointerException
[23-4-13 21:05]: at server.world.Region.getClipping(Region.java:330)
[23-4-13 21:05]: at server.model.players.PathFinder.findRoute(PathFinder.java:57)
[23-4-13 21:05]: at server.model.players.PlayerAssistant.playerWalk(PlayerAssistan
t.java:28)
[23-4-13 21:05]: at server.model.players.PlayerAssistant.followPlayer(PlayerAssist
ant.java:1383)
[23-4-13 21:05]: at server.model.players.packets.AttackPlayer.processPacket(Attack
Player.java:147)
[23-4-13 21:05]: at server.model.players.PacketHandler.processPacket(PacketHandler
.java:138)
[23-4-13 21:05]: at server.model.players.Client.processQueuedPackets(Client.java:1
187)
[23-4-13 21:05]: at server.model.players.PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:
142)
[23-4-13 21:05]: at server.Server.main(Server.java:165)
[23-4-13 21:05]: java.lang.NullPointerException
[23-4-13 21:05]: at server.world.Region.getClipping(Region.java:330)
[23-4-13 21:05]: at server.model.players.PathFinder.findRoute(PathFinder.java:57)
[23-4-13 21:05]: at server.model.players.PlayerAssistant.playerWalk(PlayerAssistan
t.java:28)
[23-4-13 21:05]: at server.model.players.PlayerAssistant.followPlayer(PlayerAssist
ant.java:1383)
[23-4-13 21:05]: at server.model.players.Client.process(Client.java:603)
[23-4-13 21:05]: at server.model.players.PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:
144)
[23-4-13 21:05]: at server.Server.main(Server.java:165)[/quote]

Can you maby help me to fix this error ?
Thanks a lot for time and maby for fix!
[/quote]
Are you calling those methods in client.?

edit:

Do you have this in your region? public Region(int id, boolean members) { this.id = id; this.members = members; }[/quote]

Yeah got that, Thanks

item.title: Clipping Attack Player Error
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

http://docs.oracle.com/javase/6/docs/api/java/lang/NullPointerException.html

Post the class where the exception is occurring, I’ll take a look at it.

I got this error when i attack a player :
